data.name: BeeFense Demo
data.detailed_description:
Protect your bee hive fortress against the hornet menace by building the best Bee defense: a BeeFense! Command your Bees to get beesy. Let them collect honey - the most precious resource in the world to build your fortress and train heroic Bee fieldrunners. Defend your bee hive fortress against the evil Queen Hornetta, who has been genetically modified in order to vanquish the bee colony and steal your honey.

FEATURES:

ENGAGE: Intense TD! Tower defense style gameplay inspired by fieldrunners!

SKIRMISH: Lead your Bees against the invasion of the thieving sting hornets!

POWER UPS: The best BeeFense needs powerful extras to boost your swarm!

BUILD A FORTRESS: Tower defense gameplay with a lot of tower types to unlock!

DEFENCE: Customize your Bee hive fortress defense strategy with 12 distinct tower abilities!

DEFENDING BEES: Collect various resources with your fieldrunners to raise your honey fortress!

STOP THE INVASION: Squash your enemies and strive for victory!

SINGLE PLAYER FUN: 20 single player levels to beat!
Command the heroic bee army and engage the sentinel legion of hornets to save your honey fortress colony.
